wikipedia_page.main: Dame Susan Elizabeth Ion (née Burrows; )  (née Burrows; 3 February 1955) is a British engineer and an expert advisor on the nuclear power industry.Ion was elected a member of the National Academy of Engineering in 2012 for contributions to nuclear fuel development.

response: * February 3 – Sue Ion, born Susan Burrows, English nuclear scientist.
** Sue Ion, born Susan Burrows, nuclear scientist
* Sue Ion (born 1955), British engineer, advisor on the nuclear power industry
